<NEW>=


At this point, as VICE GRIP came online, the first thing he did is run a =
scanner and update his files.  Upon running them over and updating his pers=
onnel records, he paused quietly.  "I assume that if LORD HYDRAS is going t=
o make a deal with the MAXIMALS, we should take this opportunity to attempt=
 to achieve some of our secondary objectives."

Pausing, "We should send a =
team to our old base for a salvage operation, and keep some of our new pers=
onnel in reserve, given I assume the MAXIMALS are not fluent wtih..  Myself=
, DINOBOT, or BLACKARACHNIA.  While the main unit of known personnel goes t=
o the parlay, we can have our other teams achieving secondary objectives an=
d ating as a strategic reserve should it become necessary."

And also to ke=
ep an optic upon TARANTALUS and CRYOTEK.  Glancing over to HYDRAS and SKY S=
HADOW for confirmatino of his suggestions then or secondary orders.
